name: Time to Run (Joror)
description:
Intro

You have awoken in a strange laboratory... 

Something has been done to you for a long time, and it was not nice.

It's Time to Run & survive!

What is this?

And action top-down fighter/shooter in kinda the Hotline Miami style.

Made for Ludum Dare 47!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Aim with the mouse
  • Left mouse button to attack or activate
  • Right mouse button to switch mode/stance
  • Q to let go
Hot tips
  • Switch modes! (right mouse btn)
  • Time-shenanigans are quantum, they don't always behave identically
  • Dying is not the end (Q)
  • Strength in numbers
  • Guns are so-so in close quarters
  • You can shoot yourself! (wait that's not a tip...)
Known issues
  • Dead bodies sometimes discombobulate if stacked
  • You can punch through walls, in the wrong way. (your arm gets stuck on the other side)
  • You might pick up a gun and not auto-draw it sometimes, because you think fists are cooler.
  • Guns can go fly off into space
  • Sometimes the enemies get bonked with the dumb-stick. Shoot them to see if that fixes it.
